about.about_subtitle: Do you need a reliable IT partner for the effective development of your business? Manasoft provides you with modern, fast, and reliable solutions!
about.about_card3_text: Years of experience in the field

customers.subtitle: Customer reviews
customers.title: Our customers' reviews
customers.text: Use the experience of Manasoft and take your business to the next level!
customers.customer1_text: Manasoft team has been amazing to work with! They developed a custom Telegram bot for us, which accelerated the process of providing services to our clients. Now we can serve our clients faster and more efficiently.

services.services_home_title2: Ideal IT solutions for your business
services.services_home_text2: Manasoft is a reliable partner in the IT world! We offer websites and mobile applications and other advanced technological solutions.
services.services_home_card1_text: Optimize your processes, increase efficiency, and digitize your business through CRM and ERP systems.
services.services_home_card2_text: We create modern and fast mobile applications for iOS and Android. Take your product to a new level!
services.services_home_card3_text: Automate services with your clients through Telegram bots and develop your business!
services.services_home_card4_text: We create fast, modern websites that are relevant to your business. Contact us to stand out from your competitors!
services.services_page_title: Innovative IT solutions - the best services for your business
services.services_page_text: The IT company Manasoft provides high-quality and innovative IT services. We help you grow your business with a wide range of solutions, from CRM/ERP systems, Telegram bots, mobile applications, and website creation.
services.services_page_card1_title: Modern mobile apps for iOS and Android
services.services_page_card1_text: Mobile apps allow your business to connect with customers more easily. We will create fast, efficient, and modern mobile applications for you.
services.services_page_card1_xizmatlar: iOS and Android app development, App design and optimization, API and server integration, App placement in the App Store and Google Play
services.services_page_card2_text: If you need modern websites to present your business online, Manasoft will provide you with the best solution.
services.services_page_card2_xizmatlar: Corporate and personal websites, online stores and e-commerce sites, SEO optimization and quick loading, Content Management Systems (CMS)
services.services_page_card3_text: Telegram bots are an effective tool for customer service, sales, information delivery, and automation. We will develop smart bots tailored to your business.
services.services_page_card3_xizmatlar: Order-taking bots, Automatic answering bots, Integration with payment systems, Database management
services.services_page_card4_text: CRM and ERP systems are the best solution for optimizing your business, working with clients, and managing processes. Manasoft will develop customized and personalized software for you.
services.services_page_card4_xizmatlar: Development and configuration of CRM systems, creation and integration of ERP systems, Client Data Management, Analytical and Computing Systems

workpage.workpage_text: The Manasoft team implements each project with precision and quality. Our approach ensures efficiency and innovation!
workpage.card1_text: To create a successful project, we first thoroughly study your needs and business goals. At this stage, we gather information and determine the strategic direction.
workpage.card2_text: The key to the project's success is a clear and carefully developed technical specifications (TS). We will document all the requirements and determine the project direction.
workpage.card3_text: The stage of selecting the most suitable technologies for the project, analyzing opportunities, and developing the necessary integrations. We will find the most optimal solution for your business!
workpage.card4_text: UX/UI design is a key factor in facilitating user interaction. We will create an attractive and functional design that suits your project.
workpage.card5_text: We will test how the project works using the prototype. At this stage, the main functions are formed and preliminary tests are conducted.
workpage.card6_text: The project will be fully completed, all functions will be tested and optimized. We offer our customers the finished product with high quality!

project1.banner_subtitle: A special mobile app for women
project1.banner_text: Femmy is an essential health calendar and daily app for every woman.
project1.project_card1_text: Femmy provides all the necessary tools for women, including a pregnancy school, daily mood tracker, ovulation calculator, childcare advice, and gynaecological recommendations.
project1.project_card2_text: Recommendations based on pregnancy weeks, pre- and postnatal care, lactation and breastfeeding advice, proper nutrition and health during pregnancy.
project1.project_card3_text: Articles on women's health, detailed information about pregnancy, childbirth, and menopause, with reliable advice approved by gynaecologists. Recommendations for postpartum recovery and care for women.

project2.banner_text: The Imperial Granite app is the official mobile application for clients, sellers, and manufacturers.
project2.project_card1_title: The purpose of the Imperial Granite app.
project2.project_card1_text: It connects clients, sellers, and manufacturers, ensuring convenient interaction at all stages, from product selection to production and delivery.
project2.project_card2_text: A complete catalogue of Imperial Granite products with high-quality photos and descriptions. An easy order placement system. Quick communication between clients, sellers, and manufacturers. Notifications about order status.
project2.project_card3_text: Clients can browse the granite product catalogue, explore their specifications, select the necessary products, and place orders in several steps.

project3.banner_subtitle: A special mobile app for women
project3.banner_text: MedAgent â€“ For medical representatives, pharmaceutical companies, managers, and supervisors
project3.project_card1_title: The purpose of the MedAgent app
project3.project_card1_text: MedAgent is an innovative ERP system designed to automate the work of medical representatives, manage visits to pharmacies and doctors, as well as handle reporting.
project3.project_card2_text: Thanks to the app, you will be able to effectively schedule meetings, keep track of interactions, and analyze results in real-time.
project3.project_card3_text: Managing the database of doctors and pharmacies. Detailed reports for each visit, automating workflows, and monitoring team efficiency in real-time.

question_page.question_text: If you have any questions, feel free to contact us - we are always ready to help!
question_page.question_card1_text: How long does it take to develop an IT project?
question_page.question_card1_answer: Manasoft is an innovative IT company, your most reliable partner in creating Telegram bots, mobile applications, and websites for your business! Our team provides clients with effective solutions through the introduction of technologies into business. Quality and prompt service - our priority!

contact_page.title: Contact Us
contact_page.description: Do you need a reliable IT partner for the effective development of your business? Manasoft provides you with modern, fast, and reliable solutions!
contact_page.card_title: We will develop your business together!
contact_page.card_text: The Manasoft team is always ready to contact you! Contact us and choose the best solution for your business. A quick and professional response is guaranteed!
contact_page.fullName_error1: You must enter at least 5 characters.
contact_page.fullName_error2: Must be at least one CAPITAL letter.
contact_page.fullName_error3: Must be at least one lowercase letter.
contact_page.phone_error: The phone number should start with +998 and have 12 digits.
contact_page.message_error: Message must be at least 10 characters long.
